document_data.mainbody:
Lorold or Torold was the porter of Delcastle Manor in the late 15 century DR.
He kept the door at Delcastle Manor.
He worked for the Delcastle family Marantine Delcastle called him "Torold", while Arclath called him "Lorold".
Lorold opened the door on two occassions to Amarune Whitewave, coinlass and lover of Arclath Delcastle. On the first time, when she was accompanied by Lord Arclath Delcastle,
